      • get

        public <T> CacheGetResult<T> get(java.lang.String branch,
                                 long timestamp,
                                 QualifiedKey qualifiedKey)
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBCache
        Queries the cache for the entry with the given key at the given branch and timestamp.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ChronoDBCache
        Parameters:
        branch - The branch to search in. Must not be null.
        timestamp - The timestamp to search at. Must not be null.
        qualifiedKey - The qualified key to search for. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The result. Never null. May be a cache miss.

      • cache

                  GetResult<?> queryResult)
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBCache
        Adds the given GetResult to this cache.

        cache in interface ChronoDBCache
        Parameters:

      • writeThrough

        public void writeThrough(java.lang.String branch,
                         long timestamp,
                         QualifiedKey key,
                         java.lang.Object value)
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBCache
        Writes the given key-value pair through the cache.

        This is similar to ChronoDBCache.cache(String, GetResult), except that this method works directly on the value object instead of a GetResult.

        This method assumes that the validity period of the given key-value pair is open-ended at the righthand side.

        Specified by:
        writeThrough in interface ChronoDBCache
        Parameters:
        branch - The branch of the entry to write through the cache.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the entry to write through the cache.
        key - The qualified key of the key-value pair
        value - The value of the key-value pair

      • rollbackToTimestamp

        public void rollbackToTimestamp(long timestamp)
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBCache
        Rolls the cache back to the specified timestamp, i.e. removes all entries that are newer than the specified timestamp.
        Specified by:
        rollbackToTimestamp in interface ChronoDBCache
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp to roll back to. Must not be negative.

      • clear

        public void clear()

      • getStatistics

        public ChronoDBCache.CacheStatistics getStatistics()
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBCache
        Returns the statistics of this cache.

        This method will return a copy of the statistics. Any modifications on the cache (including ChronoDBCache.resetStatistics()) will have no influence on the returned statistics object.

        Specified by:
        getStatistics in interface ChronoDBCache
        Returns:
        A copy of the statistics. Never null.
